reqs: Pre-reqs: Either (a) all of GRSJ 101, GRSJ 102 or (b) all of WMST 101, WMST 102. (or third-year standing.)
courseName: Globalization and Social Justice: Gender, Race, and Sexuality in International Politics
description: Critical examination of the gender dimension of globalization and the theories, discourse, and practices in international politics using gender analysis.
